title: Can billionaires save newspapers?
description:
Last week, the Wall Street Journal reported that billionaire investor Patrick Soon-Shiong was exploring a sale of the LA Times. Soon-Shiong denied this in a Tweet, but the report stirred up an ongoing conversation about billionaires and media ownership.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
